# NWUDPSessionState | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Network Extension ](/documentation/networkextension)

- [ NWUDPSessionState ](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWUDPSessionState)

-  NWUDPSessionState 

Enumeration# NWUDPSessionState

iOS 9.0–18.0DeprecatediPadOS 9.0–18.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–18.0DeprecatedmacOS 10.11–15.0DeprecatedtvOS 17.0–18.0DeprecatedvisionOS 1.0–2.0Deprecated

```
enum NWUDPSessionState
```

Deprecated

Use the [`nw_connection_state_t`](/documentation/Network/nw_connection_state_t) type from the [Network](/documentation/Network) framework instead.

## [Topics](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWUDPSessionState#topics)

### [Session States](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWUDPSessionState#Session-States)

[`case invalid`](/documentation/networkextension/nwudpsessionstate/invalid)The session is in an invalid or uninitialized state.[`case waiting`](/documentation/networkextension/nwudpsessionstate/waiting)The session is waiting for better conditions before attempting to make the session ready.[`case preparing`](/documentation/networkextension/nwudpsessionstate/preparing)The remote endpoint is being resolved.[`case ready`](/documentation/networkextension/nwudpsessionstate/ready)The session is ready for reading and writing data.[`case failed`](/documentation/networkextension/nwudpsessionstate/failed)None of the currently resolved endpoints can be used at this time, either due to problems with the path or the client rejecting the endpoints.[`case cancelled`](/documentation/networkextension/nwudpsessionstate/cancelled)The session has been cancelled by the client calling `cancel`.### [Initializers](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWUDPSessionState#Initializers)

[`init?(rawValue: Int)`](/documentation/networkextension/nwudpsessionstate/init(rawvalue:))## [Relationships](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWUDPSessionState#relationships)

### [Conforms To](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWUDPSessionState#conforms-to)

- [`BitwiseCopyable`](/documentation/Swift/BitwiseCopyable)

- [`Equatable`](/documentation/Swift/Equatable)

- [`Hashable`](/documentation/Swift/Hashable)

- [`RawRepresentable`](/documentation/Swift/RawRepresentable)

- [`Sendable`](/documentation/Swift/Sendable)

- [`SendableMetatype`](/documentation/Swift/SendableMetatype)

## [See Also](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWUDPSessionState#see-also)

### [Monitoring the session state](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWUDPSessionState#Monitoring-the-session-state)

[`var state: NWUDPSessionState`](/documentation/networkextension/nwudpsession/state)The current state of the UDP session.Deprecated[`var isViable: Bool`](/documentation/networkextension/nwudpsession/isviable)The viability of a UDP session represents whether or not data can be transferred.Deprecated
